With this action you can call any of the 12 available Other - User Events. A User Event is one that you can add scripts or action code to and then call at any time using this action, making them essentially custom object events.
The number of the user event to call (0 - 11).
The above action block code checks a variable and then calls either User Event [0] or User Event [1] depending on whether the check evaluates to <tt>true</tt> or <tt>false</tt>.
